ihm.observer

Interface SubjectMonitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Subject<ObsMonitor>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CaptorMonitor, DisplayMonitor

    public interface SubjectMonitor
extends Subject<ObsMonitor>
    SubjectMonitor is an interface used by DisplayMonitor in order to be observed by DisplayMonitor
